about_the_game:
The PITCHvr™ Vision - Pro DLC is an extensive data base of pitches for training Professional level baseball players in conjunction with the main PITCHvr™ Vision software that includes Fastballs, Curveballs, Sliders, and Change ups. (The data base that is included with PITCHvr™ Vision contains only High School level pitches.)

Please note that while PITCHvr™ Vision - Pro adapts to the players skill level during sessions, the training philosophy has been called "practice dirty, play clean." This means that during training in the virtual world, the player will be challenged by some pitches that are beyond the physical capabilities of the best pitchers in baseball. The best hitters in the world will be challenged, so leave your ego on the bench.

This pitch data set includes hundreds of 3/4 arm release pitches with the following types and speed ranges in MPH (miles per hour):

> Change up....................................................CH................86-90 MPH
> Slurve.............................................................CU1..............82-86
> Hybrid between Slurve and 12-6.........CU2...............81-85
> 12 to 6 curve...............................................CU3..............79-83
> Cutter.............................................................FC..................92-101
> Four seam fastball.....................................FF...................96-105
> Split finger fastball....................................FS..................96-105
> Two seam fastball.....................................FT...................96-105
> Slider with more run and less depth..SL1.................88-92
> Slider with less run and more depth..SL2.................90-94

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires: PITCHvr(tm) Vision; USB 3.0 port; Oculus Rift S or Oculus Quest (1 or 2) w/ Link Cable or Vive or Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires: PITCHvr(tm) Vision; USB 3.0 port; Oculus Rift S or Oculus Quest (1 or 2) w/ Link Cable or Vive or Valve Index
